original_text:
Of what use was the strength of their hands to me,
    since their vigor had gone from them?
korean_text: 그들의 기력이 쇠잔하였으니 그들의 손의 힘이 내게 무슨 소용이 있으랴

sentences.original_text: Of what use was the strength of their hands to me
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 손의 힘이 내게 무슨 소용이 있었는가

sentences.original_text: since their vigor had gone from them
